sentences.en: After Flagstaff , we ō ll go to San Diego.
sentences.cn: 到佛拉格斯塔夫之后, 我们去圣迭戈吧.

sentences.en: Flagstaff can't seem to attract industry.
sentences.cn: 弗拉格斯塔夫似乎对工业不具有吸引力.

sentences.en: I had a little flagstaff in front of houseflag with the Union Jack in the corner.
sentences.cn: 我家的门前立着一根很矮的旗杆,顶角挂着一面米字旗.

sentences.en: I pushed on towards Flagstaff, a hundred miles to the west.
sentences.cn: 我继续西行，向100英里外的弗拉格斯塔夫进发。

sentences.en: The gale blew down the flagstaff.
There is a flagstaff in the centre of the field.
There is a flagstaff in the centre of the ground.

trans.tran_en: a tall pole on which a flag hangs
